name: gyaradosite
effect: Held: Allows Gyarados to Mega Evolve into Mega Gyarados.
short_effect: Held: Allows Gyarados to Mega Evolve into Mega Gyarados.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Gyarados hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
